messages.title: THIS TIME NO SEAT IS SAFE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A policy that scraps the £100 billion Trident missile program and ends tuition fees, freeing the funds to protect the NHS from private sector encroaching.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Green Party and Labour are seriously contesting Sheffield Central.

leaflet.personalStatement: If you want an MP who will challenge authority by taxing the rich, stopping tax evasion and investing in jobs and public services, then vote Green.

politicalExperience.achievements: Jillian Creasy has been a Green Party councillor since 2004, representing Sheffield and Social Care.

endorsements.endorsement: MP of the year 2014 Caroline Lucas is backing Jillian Creasy to be Sheffield's first Green MP.

images.caption: Jillian Creasy with Caroline Lucas and supporters
